thread.title: PREIT Q4 Adj FFO Per Share $0.51

author: Reuters Editorial
title: PREIT Q4 Adj FFO Per Share $0.51
text: February 14, 2018 / 7:48 PM / in 25 minutes BRIEF-PREIT Q4 Adj FFO Per Share $0.51 Reuters Staff Feb 14 (Reuters) - Pennsylvania Real Estate Investment Trust : * PREIT REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * SEES FY 2018 FFO PER SHARE $1.50 TO $1.60 * Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.51 * PREIT - ‍SAME STORE NOI EXCLUDING LEASE TERMINATIONS INCREASED BY 4.0% FOR QUARTER​ * PREIT SEES 2018 SAME STORE NOI GROWTH, EXCLUDING LEASE TERMINATIONS, IN RANGE OF 1.25% TO 2.25% * PREIT - SEES ‍FY 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN RANGE OF $220 TO $240 MILLION​ * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.69 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * PREIT QTRLY ‍FFO PER DILUTED SHARE AND OP UNIT $0.44​ * Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.47 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
